segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, stretching his little body to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to share the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her open palm, ready to receive a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so focused on the cookies, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is ready to catch any falling cookies, like he's done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there, unaware of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, highlighting his mischievous act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork, even though it's a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
